data.DescriptionHtml:
By drawing on the power of the sun, you cause your body to emanate fire.
This fire extends 5 feet in all directions from your body, illuminating the area and doing 1d4+1 points of fire damage (Reflex save for half) to any creature it touches except you.
data.Name: Body of the Sun
data.Rulebook: Masters of the Wild: A Guidebook to Barbarians, Druids, and Rangers
